name: Dungeon Gunner 2D
description:
Space = Flip and Invinsibility for a short time

WASD = basic movement

Left Click on Mouse = Shoot

E = Action/Pick up

TAB = Change Gun

Make it through the procedually generated 3 levels. Then face the Eye Ball Boss at the end. have FUN!!

HINT +++++ The main Player you start with remains invinsible for a long time so you can jsut beat the game.
